General.Name: Hootech Inc.
General.Description: Hootech Inc. operates a precious metal recycling companies in China. Its principal products are platinum, palladium, rhodium, silver, and other precious metals and their new material products. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Xuzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 1 Liu Jing Road, Xuzhou, China, 221004
